sentences.en: Everybody knew how cold and heartless she was.
sentences.cn: 大家都知道思嘉为人多么冷酷,多么无情.

sentences.en: How can she be so heartless?
How can you be so heartless?
I couldn't believe they were so heartless.
sentences.cn: 我无法相信他们竟如此狠心。

sentences.en: I will be very heartless if you do.
sentences.cn: 要是你告诉他的话,那就太残酷无情了.

sentences.en: It was a heartless thing to do.
It was heartless of you [ you were heartless ] to leave without saying good - bye.
sentences.cn: 你不告而别实在太狠心了.

sentences.en: Sim did a phenomenal job presenting the heartless, miserly, self - centered Scrooge.
sentences.cn: 他成功地演绎了这个无情 、 吝啬 、 自我 中心的主人翁.

sentences.en: Smile seemed heartless in its brilliancy.
sentences.cn: 她那容光焕发的微笑似乎是残酷的.

sentences.en: The actions of very vain , heartless, pleasure - seeking people are very often improper.
sentences.cn: 凡是爱虚荣、贪享受 、 没心肝的人,作出来的事多半下流.

sentences.en: The heartless witch cast a spell on the poor little girl.
sentences.cn: 狠心的女巫对孤苦无助的小女孩施了妖术.

sentences.en: Though heartless, the Stanhopes were not selfish.
sentences.cn: 斯坦霍普家虽然冷漠无情, 却并不自私.

sentences.en: What a heartless thing to say!
You are the most selfish, heartless creature in existence.
sentences.cn: 你是世界是最自私 、 最没良心的家伙.

sentences.en: You couldn't be so heartless as to disown him.
sentences.cn: 你不能那么没心肝,连认都不认他.

words.tran_cn: 心脏；感情；勇气；心形；要点

trans.tran_cn: 无情的，狠心的，无情无义，没良心，薄情无义
trans.tran_en: cruel and not feeling any pity
